The claim states that Jim Acosta: Chief White House Correspondent for CNN, was banned from the White House, while Patrick Casey, Leader of Neo Nazi group Evropa, received a White House visit.
The expert: s verdict also mentions that the White House visitor logs are not publicly available, but White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders confirmed that Casey's visit was part of the White House Fall Garden Tour, which is open to anyone with free tickets.
The meme circulating online: which included pictures of Acosta and Casey, was misleading in implying that Casey's visit was a result of preferential treatment from the Trump administration.
